text: The women's lightweight double sculls competition at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro was held on 8–12 August at the Lagoon Rodrigo de Freitas. The medals for the competition were presented by Poul-Erik Høyer, Denmark, member of the International Olympic Committee, and the gifts were presented by Tricia Smith, Canada, Vice President of the International Rowing Federation. ==Results== ===Heats=== First two of each heat qualify to the semifinals, remainder goes to the repechage. ====Heat 1==== {|class="wikitable" !Rank !Rower !Country
